Maverick AV Solutions with: Avocor

A Platform's Best Friend

70% of colleagues believe that Interactive monitors are better for brainstorming, ideation and collaboration with remote colleagues.

Avocor displays feature 4K screen resolution, bringing content to life with stunning visuals and crystal-clear clarity, creating a more engaging experience for every sector and market.

G Series

Spectacularly sleek, 4" thin edge-to-edge bezel-less interactive displays engineered to impress when they're on and even when they are turned off.

Feautures:

  • Switch from pen to finger with palm rest and rejection.
  • Built in sensors turn the display on when you're in the room and when you leave the room.
  • Simply the most elegant and precise whiteboard, inking and annotation.
  • Single cable connects 4K video, audio, USB touch, Ethernet and power.

E Series

The E series interactive displays utilize the very latest optimized touch technology and superior glass technology providing a smooth and extremely accurate, low latency writing experience as well as object recognition. The ability to easily switch between using a pen, finger, and palm create for a fluid collaborative environment for users in real-time and introduces Avocor’s UiQ touch enabled interface.

Features:

  • Dynamic user interface with remote control free usage
  • Superior glass technology provides a smooth and extremely accurate, low latency writing experience.
  • 4K video with enhanced HDMI
  • Front facing sound bar module delivering crystal-clear audio
  • Available as 55", 65", 75" and 86"

W Series

W-series interactive panels offer an integrated, high-quality conference camera with a microphone array and audio optimised for use with UC platforms to create the perfect video collaboration environment.

Features:

  • Microsoft Azure certifies with built in IOT sensors for room insights.
  • Single type USB-C cable solution for easy connection.
  • Integrated conference-grade camera, microphone and stereo speakers.
  • Front of display controls, including windows home button for easy access.
  • Available as 55" and 65".

GroupShare

Avocor GroupShare also simplifies the meeting experience, with built-in support for one-touch conference calls for any UC software.

Integrating Avocor GroupShare on all your Avocor displays provides an easy and consistent meeting experience making it easy and intuitive to connect and collaborate from every room and display. Compatible with devices and safe and secure for all files and networks.

  • Avocor GroupShare for Microsoft 365 comes preconfigured for the Microsoft enterprise customers. It features Microsoft Office 365 authentication and room resource calendar integration, one-click accessibility of the Microsoft 365 personal calendar, OneDrive access, and secure, wireless screen-sharing.
  • Walk-up, select your meeting and go! Instantly videoconference using Zoom, Microsoft Teams, WebEx, Meet, GoToMeeting and more. A single-touch start gets you right in your meeting.

Google Series One

Bringing meeting equity to everyone, in-person and remote, the new Google Meet Series One interactive displays by Avocor provide the most inclusive and immersive meeting experiences for teams.

Board 65

The 65" Series One Board 65 can be wall-mounted in small-to-medium collaboration spaces or places on the purpose-built stand for spontaneous meetings everywhere.

  • Hands-free Google AI
  • Single-touch Google Meet Start
  • USB-C connection available for BYOM
  • Ideal partner with Jamboard App
  • All-in-one EPTZ Camera, True-voice audio and microphone.

Desk 27

Ideal for personal workstation, in the home office, hot desks or private offices, the Series One Desk 27 is an all-in-one touchscreen device.

  • TrueVoice™ audio for crystal clear sound
  • Digital whiteboarding with the Jamboard app
  • Digital PTZ camera that provides wild field-of-view and perfect audio framing.
  • Can also be used a desk monitor or laptop docking station.
